verses.verse: And Moses<WH4872> gathered<WH6950> all the congregation<WH5712> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> together<WH6950>, and said<WH559> unto them, These are the words<WH1697> which the LORD<WH3068> hath commanded<WH6680>, that ye should do<WH6213> them.

Six<WH8337> days<WH3117> shall work<WH4399> be done<WH6213>, but on the seventh<WH7637> day<WH3117> there shall be to you an holy day<WH6944>, a sabbath<WH7676> of rest<WH7677> to the LORD<WH3068>: whosoever doeth<WH6213> work<WH4399> therein shall be put to death<WH4191>. an: Heb. holiness
Ye shall kindle<WH1197> no fire<WH784> throughout your habitations<WH4186> upon the sabbath<WH7676> day<WH3117>.

And Moses<WH4872> spake<WH559> unto all the congregation<WH5712> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, saying<WH559>, This is the thing<WH1697> which the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680>, saying<WH559>,

Take<WH3947> ye from among you an offering<WH8641> unto the LORD<WH3068>: whosoever<WH3605> is of a willing<WH5081> heart<WH3820>, let him bring<WH935> it, an offering<WH8641> of the LORD<WH3068>; gold<WH2091>, and silver<WH3701>, and brass<WH5178>,
And blue<WH8504>, and purple<WH713>, and scarlet<WH8144> <WH8438>, and fine linen<WH8336>, and goats'<WH5795> hair,
And rams'<WH352> skins<WH5785> dyed red<WH119>, and badgers'<WH8476> skins<WH5785>, and shittim<WH7848> wood<WH6086>,
And oil<WH8081> for the light<WH3974>, and spices<WH1314> for anointing<WH4888> oil<WH8081>, and for the sweet<WH5561> incense<WH7004>,
And onyx<WH7718> stones<WH68>, and stones<WH68> to be set<WH4394> for the ephod<WH646>, and for the breastplate<WH2833>.
And every wise<WH2450> hearted<WH3820> among you shall come<WH935>, and make<WH6213> all that the LORD<WH3068> hath commanded<WH6680>;
The tabernacle<WH4908>, his tent<WH168>, and his covering<WH4372>, his taches<WH7165>, and his boards<WH7175>, his bars<WH1280>, his pillars<WH5982>, and his sockets<WH134>,
The ark<WH727>, and the staves<WH905> thereof, with the mercy seat<WH3727>, and the vail<WH6532> of the covering<WH4539>,
The table<WH7979>, and his staves<WH905>, and all his vessels<WH3627>, and the shewbread<WH6440> <WH3899>,
The candlestick<WH4501> also for the light<WH3974>, and his furniture<WH3627>, and his lamps<WH5216>, with the oil<WH8081> for the light<WH3974>,

And the incense<WH7004> altar<WH4196>, and his staves<WH905>, and the anointing<WH4888> oil<WH8081>, and the sweet<WH5561> incense<WH7004>, and the hanging<WH4539> for the door at the entering in<WH6607> of the tabernacle<WH4908>,
The altar<WH4196> of burnt offering<WH5930>, with his brasen<WH5178> grate<WH4345>, his staves<WH905>, and all his vessels<WH3627>, the laver<WH3595> and his foot<WH3653>,
The hangings<WH7050> of the court<WH2691>, his pillars<WH5982>, and their sockets<WH134>, and the hanging<WH4539> for the door<WH8179> of the court<WH2691>,
The pins<WH3489> of the tabernacle<WH4908>, and the pins<WH3489> of the court<WH2691>, and their cords<WH4340>,

The cloths<WH899> of service<WH8278>, to do service<WH8334> in the holy<WH6944> place, the holy<WH6944> garments<WH899> for Aaron<WH175> the priest<WH3548>, and the garments<WH899> of his sons<WH1121>, to minister in the priest's office<WH3547>.
And all the congregation<WH5712> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> departed<WH3318> from the presence<WH6440> of Moses<WH4872>.

And they came<WH935>, every one<WH376> whose<WH834> heart<WH3820> stirred him up<WH5375>, and every one whom his spirit<WH7307> made willing<WH5068>, and they brought<WH935> the LORD'S<WH3068> offering<WH8641> to the work<WH4399> of the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation<WH4150>, and for all his service<WH5656>, and for the holy<WH6944> garments<WH899>.

And they came<WH935>, both<WH5921> men<WH582> and women<WH802>, as many as<WH3605> were willing<WH5081> hearted<WH3820>, and brought<WH935> bracelets<WH2397>, and earrings<WH5141>, and rings<WH2885>, and tablets<WH3558>, all jewels<WH3627> of gold<WH2091>: and every man<WH376> that offered<WH5130> offered an offering<WH8573> of gold<WH2091> unto the LORD<WH3068>.

And every man<WH376>, with whom was found<WH4672> blue<WH8504>, and purple<WH713>, and scarlet<WH8144> <WH8438>, and fine linen<WH8336>, and goats'<WH5795> hair, and red<WH119> skins<WH5785> of rams<WH352>, and badgers'<WH8476> skins<WH5785>, brought<WH935> them.

Every one that did offer<WH7311> an offering<WH8641> of silver<WH3701> and brass<WH5178> brought<WH935> the LORD'S<WH3068> offering<WH8641>: and every man, with whom was found<WH4672> shittim<WH7848> wood<WH6086> for any work<WH4399> of the service<WH5656>, brought<WH935> it.

And all the women<WH802> that were wise<WH2450> hearted<WH3820> did spin<WH2901> with their hands<WH3027>, and brought<WH935> that which they had spun<WH4299>, both of blue<WH8504>, and of purple<WH713>, and of scarlet<WH8144> <WH8438>, and of fine linen<WH8336>.
And all the women<WH802> whose heart<WH3820> stirred<WH5375> them up in wisdom<WH2451> spun<WH2901> goats'<WH5795> hair.
And the rulers<WH5387> brought<WH935> onyx<WH7718> stones<WH68>, and stones<WH68> to be set<WH4394>, for the ephod<WH646>, and for the breastplate<WH2833>;
And spice<WH1314>, and oil<WH8081> for the light<WH3974>, and for the anointing<WH4888> oil<WH8081>, and for the sweet<WH5561> incense<WH7004>.

The children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> brought<WH935> a willing offering<WH5071> unto the LORD<WH3068>, every man<WH376> and woman<WH802>, whose<WH834> heart<WH3820> made them willing<WH5068> to bring<WH935> for all manner of work<WH4399>, which the LORD<WH3068> had commanded<WH6680> to be made<WH6213> by the hand<WH3027> of Moses<WH4872>.

And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> unto the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, See<WH7200>, the LORD<WH3068> hath called<WH7121> by name<WH8034> Bezaleel<WH1212> the son<WH1121> of Uri<WH221>, the son<WH1121> of Hur<WH2354>, of the tribe<WH4294> of Judah<WH3063>;
And he hath filled<WH4390> him with the spirit<WH7307> of God<WH430>, in wisdom<WH2451>, in understanding<WH8394>, and in knowledge<WH1847>, and in all manner of workmanship<WH4399>;
And to devise<WH2803> curious works<WH4284>, to work<WH6213> in gold<WH2091>, and in silver<WH3701>, and in brass<WH5178>,
And in the cutting<WH2799> of stones<WH68>, to set<WH4390> them, and in carving<WH2799> of wood<WH6086>, to make<WH6213> any manner of cunning<WH4284> work<WH4399>.
And he hath put<WH5414> in his heart<WH3820> that he may teach<WH3384>, both he, and Aholiab<WH171>, the son<WH1121> of Ahisamach<WH294>, of the tribe<WH4294> of Dan<WH1835>.

Them hath he filled<WH4390> with wisdom<WH2451> of heart<WH3820>, to work<WH6213> all manner of work<WH4399>, of the engraver<WH2796>, and of the cunning workman<WH2803>, and of the embroiderer<WH7551>, in blue<WH8504>, and in purple<WH713>, in scarlet<WH8144> <WH8438>, and in fine linen<WH8336>, and of the weaver<WH707>, even of them that do<WH6213> any<WH3605> work<WH4399>, and of those that devise<WH2803> cunning work<WH4284>.
